introduction: After the fall of the Iron Curtain numerous unexplained case files have emerged from deep inside the former Soviet Union archives.These files tell of bizarre phenomenon, monstrous creatures and sinister occurrences.Brand newRussia’s Mystery Files (Fridays at 10PM from 21 November) investigates these rumours – from mountain wild-men to terrifying zombie dogs to a profoundly mysterious incident on the Mountain of the Dead.Eyewitness testimony and powerful point-of-view dramatic reconstructions will bring these extraordinary stories to life.You will enter a world where nothing is quite as it seems…
